channel.title: How Do i move custom items to the right place?
channel.description: For example when i wear this custom rune hat it goes where the wepon should go. How do i make it go were the hat should go. It's not just for this item its for a lot of items so it would be cool if you helped thanks!

item.title: How Do i move custom items to the right place?
item.dc:creator: @grimreaper61 grimreaper61
item.description:
@grimreaper61 wrote:

easiest way to do this is to change the item id you are replacing. you probably used the id of a weapon to be overwritten by the rune “hat” or whatever it is. Find the id for say a colored wizard hat that no one will miss. That way it will automatically go on the head. All of that is done client side btw

Read full topic
item.source: How Do i move custom items to the right place?
